item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for Delo, 2–4 July 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Piratska stranka Slovenije (Greens/EFA): 0 seats
  • Gibanje Svoboda (RE): 2–3 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for Delo, 2–4 July 2024 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Mediana for Delo, 2–4 July 2024 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Piratska stranka Slovenije (Greens/EFA): 2.1–4.7%
  • Gibanje Svoboda (RE): 19.7–25.8%
  • Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 29.5–36.3%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 8.1–12.5%
  • Konkretno (RE): 0.2–1.4%
  • Resni.ca (NI): 3.1–6.2%
  • VESNA–Zelena stranka (Greens/EFA): 5.4–9.1%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 4.8–8.4%
  • Naša dežela (*): 0.1–1.0%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 2.1–4.7%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (PfE): 2.0–4.6%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 3.3–6.3%
